mc.name: Elephant Resurgence
mc.oracleText: Each player puts a green Elephant creature token into play. Those creatures have "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard."
mc.printedText: Each player puts a green Elephant creature token into play. Those creatures have "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard."

mc.name: Wintermoon Mesa
mc.oracleText:
Wintermoon Mesa comes into play tapped.

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wintermoon Mesa: Tap two target lands.
mc.printedText:
Wintermoon Mesa comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wintermoon Mesa: Tap two target lands.
mc.flavorText:
Dark is light and day is night
When the winter moon shines.

mc.name: Sword Dancer
mc.oracleText: {W}{W}: Target attacking creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {W}{W}: Target attacking creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Most soldiers think of the sword as a weapon. In the hands of Zho monks, swords are also the strongest of shields.

mc.name: Trenching Steed
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a land: Trenching Steed gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a land: Trenching Steed gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The Keldons took several of the steeds as trophies of war. They'd never seen such a light beast stand so firm.

mc.name: Troubled Healer
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a land: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a land: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.flavorText: "Which is worse: nothing to defend, or no one to defend it?"

mc.name: Diving Griffin
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance
mc.printedText:
Flying
Attacking doesn't cause Diving Griffin to tap.
mc.flavorText:
To outrace the griffin
--Kipamu expression meaning
"to do the impossible"

mc.name: Glittering Lynx
mc.oracleText:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx.
{2}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lynx loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx." Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx.
{2}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lynx loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx." Any player may play this ability.

mc.name: Mageta's Boon
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
mc.printedText:
You may play Mageta's Boon any time you could play an instant.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
mc.flavorText:
When the Lion roars, his cubs grow stronger.
--Kipamu saying

mc.name: Rhystic Shield
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn. They get an additional +0/+2 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn. They get an additional +0/+2 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
mc.flavorText: A shield for one is good. A shield for everyone is even better.

mc.name: Flowering Field
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn."
mc.printedText: Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn."
mc.flavorText: Some lands are soothing, and their peace can be felt in the soul.

mc.name: Excise
mc.oracleText: Remove target attacking creature from the game unless its controller pays {X}.
mc.printedText: Remove target attacking creature from the game unless its controller pays {X}.
mc.flavorText:
"Creation is no great feat. Anything you make, I can unmake in a heartbeat."
--Alexi, zephyr mage

mc.name: Mirror Strike
mc.oracleText: Target unblocked creature deals combat damage to its controller instead of to you this turn.
mc.printedText: Target unblocked creature deals combat damage to its controller instead of to you this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Enemies can be your weapons or your shields. Simply show them which they are."
--The Teachings of Zho

mc.name: Mine Bearer
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Mine Bearer: Destroy target attacking creature.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Mine Bearer: Destroy target attacking creature.
mc.flavorText: "The Keldons may have explosive tempers, but I have explosives."

mc.name: Shield Dancer
mc.oracleText: {2}{W}: The next time target attacking creature would deal combat damage to Shield Dancer this turn, that creature deals that damage to itself instead.
mc.printedText: {2}{W}: The next time target attacking creature would deal combat damage to Shield Dancer this turn, that creature deals that damage to itself instead.
mc.flavorText: The harder your strike, the stronger her defense.

mc.name: Entangler
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can block any number of creatures.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature may block any number of creatures.
mc.flavorText: "Tell me again," said Latulla, raising her fist, "how just one woman held back an entire Keldon platoon."

mc.name: Glittering Lion
mc.oracleText:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion.
{3}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lion loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion." Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion.
{3}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lion loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion." Any player may play this ability.

mc.name: Reveille Squad
mc.oracleText: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, if Reveille Squad is untapped, you may untap all creatures you control.
mc.printedText: Whenever you're attacked, if Reveille Squad is untapped, you may untap all creatures you control.
mc.flavorText: "To arms To arms The Lion roars"

mc.name: Aura Fracture
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.
mc.flavorText: Jamuraa's rhystic mages treat magic as their garden, uprooting unwanted spells as bothersome weeds.

mc.name: Abolish
mc.oracleText:
You may discard a Plains card rather than pay Abolish's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText:
You may discard a plains from your hand instead of paying Abolish's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.flavorText: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

mc.name: Rhystic Circle
mc.oracleText: {1}: Any player may pay {1}. If no one does, the next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText: {1}: Any player may pay {1}. If no one does, the next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.flavorText: The circle buys time--an important commodity in battle.

mc.name: Mercenary Informer
mc.oracleText:
Mercenary Informer can't be the target of black spells or abilities from black sources.
{2}{W}: Put target Mercenary on the bottom of its owner's library.
mc.printedText:
Mercenary Informer can't be the target of black spells or abilities.
{2}{W}: Put target Mercenary card on the bottom of its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: The problem with rebels is that they so quickly reject authority.

mc.name: Avatar of Hope
mc.oracleText:
If you have 3 life or less, Avatar of Hope costs {6} less to play.
Flying
Avatar of Hope can block any number of creatures.
mc.printedText:
Flying
If you have 3 life or less, Avatar of Hope costs {6} less to play.
Avatar of Hope may block any number of creatures.

mc.name: Mageta the Lion
mc.oracleText: {2}{W}{W}, {T}, Discard two cards: Destroy all creatures except for Mageta the Lion. Those creatures can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: {2}{W}{W}, {T}, Discard two cards from your hand: Destroy all creatures except for Mageta the Lion. Those creatures can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText: In the jungle of war there is always a Lion.

mc.name: Jeweled Spirit
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Sacrifice two lands: Jeweled Spirit gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Sacrifice two lands: Jeweled Spirit gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: As he knows all the world completely, the world refuses him harm.

mc.name: Celestial Convergence
mc.oracleText:
Celestial Convergence comes into play with seven omen counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an omen counter from Celestial Convergence. If there are no omen counters on Celestial Convergence, the player with the highest life total wins the game. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, the game is a draw.
mc.printedText:
Celestial Convergence comes into play with seven omen counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an omen counter from Celestial Convergence. If there are no omen counters on Celestial Convergence, the player with the highest life total wins the game. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, the game is a draw.

mc.name: Sheltering Prayers
mc.oracleText: Basic lands each player controls have shroud as long as that player controls three or fewer lands. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Basic lands each player controls can't be the targets of spells or abilities as long as that player controls three or fewer lands.
mc.flavorText: "It matters not if the gods hear my prayers. Jamuraa does."

mc.name: Blessed Wind
mc.oracleText: Target player's life total becomes 20.
mc.printedText: Target player's life total becomes 20.
mc.flavorText:
"The fourth wind of ascension is Anointer, deifying the worthy."
--Keld Triumphant

mc.name: Samite Sanctuary
mc.oracleText: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Any player may play this ability.
mc.flavorText:
Our war is against suffering, not against those who cause it.
--Samite creed

mc.name: Ribbon Snake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{2}: Ribbon Snake loses flying until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{2}: Ribbon Snake loses flying until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
mc.flavorText: All snakes slither. Only this one soars.

mc.name: Hazy Homunculus
mc.oracleText: Hazy Homunculus is unblockable as long as defending player controls an untapped land.
mc.printedText: Hazy Homunculus is unblockable as long as defending player controls an untapped land.
mc.flavorText: They hide in dreams and whispers and faraway thoughts.

mc.name: Gulf Squid
mc.oracleText: When Gulf Squid comes into play, tap all lands target player controls.
mc.printedText: When Gulf Squid comes into play, tap all lands target player controls.
mc.flavorText: If it could capture the power it wastes, it would be invincible.

mc.name: Coastal Hornclaw
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Jamuraan farmers fear three things above all else: droughts, floods, and hornclaws.

mc.name: Sunken Field
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}."
mc.printedText: Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}."
mc.flavorText: The land is heavy with promise, the harvest ripe with betrayal.

mc.name: Rhystic Deluge
mc.oracleText: {U}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays {1}.
mc.printedText: {U}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays {1}.
mc.flavorText:
"I'll rain down on you with the power of magic itself. Then we'll see who prevails."
--Alexi, zephyr mage

mc.name: Rhystic Scrying
mc.oracleText: Draw three cards. Then, if any player pays {2}, discard three cards.
mc.printedText: Draw three cards. Then, if any player pays {2}, discard three cards from your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"The trick is to ask when no one's listening."
--Alexi, zephyr mage

mc.name: Mana Vapors
mc.oracleText: Lands target player controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.
mc.printedText: Lands target player controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.
mc.flavorText: The scent of magic can rob you of your senses, blinding you to the world.

mc.name: Alexi's Cloak
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText:
You may play Alexi's Cloak any time you could play an instant.
Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.
mc.flavorText:
"Doesn't look like much, does it?"
--Alexi, zephyr mage

mc.name: Withdraw
mc.oracleText: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Then return another target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.
mc.printedText: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Then return another target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.
mc.flavorText: "We outnumber them Charge Charge Hey, where'd you guys go? Retreat Retreat"

mc.name: Spiketail Hatchling
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Sacrifice Spiketail Hatchling: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Sacrifice Spiketail Hatchling: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
mc.flavorText: It dodges waves of water to prepare for waves of magic.

mc.name: Quicksilver Wall
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{4}: Return Quicksilver Wall to its owner's hand. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
{4}: Return Quicksilver Wall to its owner's hand. Any player may play this ability.
mc.flavorText: "Ogg hit wall. Ogg no kill wall. Ogg hate wall"

mc.name: Stormwatch Eagle
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Sacrifice a land: Return Stormwatch Eagle to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Sacrifice a land: Return Stormwatch Eagle to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: When eagles leave the sky, sailors leave the sea.

mc.name: Troublesome Spirit
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the end of your turn, tap all lands you control.
mc.printedText:
Flying
At the end of your turn, tap all lands you control.
mc.flavorText: As erratic and turbulent as a summer squall.

mc.name: Windscouter
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Windscouter attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Windscouter attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat.
mc.flavorText: These nimble ships were designed for hit-and-run tactics.

mc.name: Excavation
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card. Any player may play this ability.
mc.flavorText:
"There are secrets out there begging to be rediscovered. We just need to look in the right places."
--Teferi, planeswalker

mc.name: Foil
mc.oracleText:
You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay Foil's mana cost.
Counter target spell.
mc.printedText:
You may discard an island and another card from your hand instead of paying Foil's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

mc.name: Rethink
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.
mc.flavorText: "Are you sure you want to do that?"

mc.name: Rhystic Study
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
mc.printedText: Whenever an opponent plays a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
mc.flavorText: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you need to know.

mc.name: Avatar of Will
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent has no cards in hand, Avatar of Will costs {6} less to play.
Flying
mc.printedText:
Flying
If an opponent has no cards in hand, Avatar of Will costs {6} less to play.

mc.name: Alexi, Zephyr Mage
mc.oracleText: {X}{U}, {T}, Discard two cards: Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: {X}{U}, {T}, Discard two cards from your hand: Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText: The Keldons didn't know her name, but they still cursed her in battle.

mc.name: Spiketail Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Sacrifice Spiketail Drake: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Sacrifice Spiketail Drake: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
mc.flavorText: "The spell will have to wait," said Alexi, pointing up. "Drakes."

mc.name: Psychic Theft
mc.oracleText: Target player reveals his or her hand. Choose an instant or sorcery card from it, and remove that card from the game. As long as the card remains removed from the game, you may play it. At end of turn, if you haven't played the card, return it to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Look at target player's hand, choose an instant or sorcery card from it, and remove that card from the game. You may play the card as though it were in your hand as long as the card remains removed from the game. At end of turn, if you haven't played the card, return it to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Heightened Awareness
mc.oracleText:
As Heightened Awareness comes into play, discard your hand.

At the beginning of your draw step, draw a card.
mc.printedText:
As Heightened Awareness comes into play, discard your hand.
At the beginning of your draw step, draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"It startles me how alive one feels on the edge of death."
--Barrin, master wizard

mc.name: Shrouded Serpent
mc.oracleText: Whenever Shrouded Serpent attacks, defending player may pay {4}. If he or she doesn't, Shrouded Serpent is unblockable this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Shrouded Serpent attacks, defending player may pay {4}. If he or she doesn't, Shrouded Serpent is unblockable this turn.
mc.flavorText: Many travelers have wandered into a fog only to find that it had teeth, claws, and an appetite.

mc.name: Denying Wind
mc.oracleText: Search target player's library for up to seven cards and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Search target player's library for up to seven cards and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
mc.flavorText:
"The third wind of ascension is Eliminator, clearing Keld's path to victory."
--Keld Triumphant

mc.name: Overburden
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player puts a nontoken creature into play, that player returns a land he or she controls to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player puts a creature card into play, that player returns a land he or she controls to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: The Kipamu League knew what Keld refused to acknowledge: the land could support no more.

mc.name: Nakaya Shade
mc.oracleText: {B}: Nakaya Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
mc.printedText: {B}: Nakaya Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
mc.flavorText: Made strong by reckless magic. Made horrid by reckless strife.

mc.name: Death Charmer
mc.oracleText: Whenever Death Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life unless he or she pays {2}.
mc.printedText: Whenever Death Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life unless he or she pays {2}.
mc.flavorText: It vents the chill of the grave.

mc.name: Bog Glider
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for a Mercenary card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Agent of Shauku
mc.oracleText: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Go ahead. Take it. You'll be so very powerful . . . and what harm can it do?"

mc.name: Fen Stalker
mc.oracleText: Fen Stalker has fear as long as you control no untapped lands.
mc.printedText: Fen Stalker can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures as long as you control no untapped lands.
mc.flavorText: As silent as a shadow, and just as hard to flee.

mc.name: Whipstitched Zombie
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Whipstitched Zombie unless you pay {B}.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Whipstitched Zombie unless you pay {B}.
mc.flavorText: Pity the tailor.

mc.name: Greel's Caress
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
mc.printedText:
You may play Greel's Caress any time you could play an instant.
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
mc.flavorText: Greel's grin is far less loathsome than his touch.

mc.name: Soul Strings
mc.oracleText: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand unless any player pays {X}.
mc.printedText: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand unless any player pays {X}.
mc.flavorText: Everyone is manipulated. It's just more obvious with the dead.

mc.name: Flay
mc.oracleText: Target player discards a card at random. Then that player discards another card at random unless he or she pays {1}.
mc.printedText: Target player discards a card at random from his or her hand. Then that player discards another card at random from his or her hand unless he or she pays {1}.
mc.flavorText: The Keldons would never admit it, but Greel unsettles them, too.

mc.name: Steal Strength
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: With each grunt of pain from Haddad, Greel's grin widened.

mc.name: Wall of Vipers
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Destroy Wall of Vipers and target creature it's blocking. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
{3}: Destroy Wall of Vipers and target creature it's blocking. Any player may play this ability.
mc.flavorText:
What wall can never be climbed, but is always scaled?
--Nakaya riddle

mc.name: Plague Fiend
mc.oracleText: Whenever Plague Fiend deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature unless its controller pays {2}.
mc.printedText: Whenever Plague Fiend deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature unless its controller pays {2}.
mc.flavorText: As the strange plague ravaged Jamuraa, the fiends multiplied.

mc.name: Soul Charmer
mc.oracleText: Whenever Soul Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, you gain 2 life unless that creature's controller pays {2}.
mc.printedText: Whenever Soul Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, you gain 2 life unless that creature's controller pays {2}.
mc.flavorText: She seeks the warmth of the living.

mc.name: Pit Raptor
mc.oracleText:
Flying, first strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Pit Raptor unless you pay {2}{B}{B}.
mc.printedText:
Flying, first strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Pit Raptor unless you pay {2}{B}{B}.

mc.name: Outbreak
mc.oracleText:
You may discard a Swamp card rather than pay Outbreak's mana cost.
Choose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
You may discard a swamp from your hand instead of paying Outbreak's mana cost.
Choose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: This plague chooses its victims.

mc.name: Rhystic Tutor
mc.oracleText: Unless any player pays {2}, search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Unless any player pays {2}, search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Any lock can be undone, any secret revealed.

mc.name: Despoil
mc.oracleText: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.
mc.printedText: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Nothing could grow where the vile smoke had been, and no one could breathe it and live.

mc.name: Endbringer's Revel
mc.oracleText: {4}: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Any player may play this ability but only any time he or she could play a sorcery.
mc.printedText: {4}: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Any player may play this ability but only any time he or she could play a sorcery.
mc.flavorText: First death. Then Shauku.

mc.name: Rebel Informer
mc.oracleText:
Rebel Informer can't be the target of white spells or abilities from white sources.
{3}: Put target Rebel on the bottom of its owner's library.
mc.printedText:
Rebel Informer can't be the target of white spells or abilities.
{3}: Put target Rebel card on the bottom of its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: The problem with mercenaries is that if you can buy their loyalty, others can too.

mc.name: Coffin Puppets
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice two lands: Return Coffin Puppets from your graveyard to play. Play this ability only during your upkeep and only if you control a Swamp.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice two lands: Return Coffin Puppets to play. Play this ability only during your upkeep, only if Coffin Puppets is in your graveyard, and only if you control a swamp.
mc.flavorText: The ground won't accept them.

mc.name: Greel, Mind Raker
mc.oracleText: {X}{B}, {T}, Discard two cards: Target player discards X cards at random.
mc.printedText: {X}{B}, {T}, Discard two cards from your hand: Target player discards X cards at random from his or her hand.
mc.flavorText: "You're Latulla's gift to me, and I always play with my presents."

mc.name: Bog Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Protection from white
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Bog Elemental unless you sacrifice a land.
mc.printedText:
Protection from white
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Bog Elemental unless you sacrifice a land.
mc.flavorText:
"When the bog walks, the wise run."
--Erissa, bog witch

mc.name: Avatar of Woe
mc.oracleText:
If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to play.
Fear
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText:
If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to play.
Avatar of Woe can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Plague Wind
mc.oracleText: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy."
--Keld Triumphant

mc.name: Rhystic Syphon
mc.oracleText: Unless target player pays {3}, he or she loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.
mc.printedText: Unless target player pays {3}, he or she loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.
mc.flavorText: Jamuraan wizards are linked together by magic, a bond that only the wicked dare exploit.

mc.name: Infernal Genesis
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. He or she then puts X 1/1 black Minion creature tokens into play, where X is that card's converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. He or she then puts X 1/1 black Minion creature tokens into play, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

mc.name: Spur Grappler
mc.oracleText: Spur Grappler gets +2/+1 as long as you control no untapped lands.
mc.printedText: Spur Grappler gets +2/+1 as long as you control no untapped lands.
mc.flavorText: Grapplers hunt in packs, driving their victims over steep mountain cliffs.

mc.name: Fault Riders
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a land: Fault Riders gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a land: Fault Riders gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.flavorText: They turn geological upheaval into tactical advantage.

mc.name: Ridgeline Rager
mc.oracleText: {R}: Ridgeline Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Ridgeline Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: While armies battled across Jamuraa, beasts stalked the high places looking for victims.

mc.name: Whip Sergeant
mc.oracleText: {R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack this turn.)
mc.printedText: {R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.flavorText: Keldon soldiers learn to move faster than the whip.

mc.name: Keldon Berserker
mc.oracleText: Whenever Keldon Berserker attacks, if you control no untapped lands, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Keldon Berserker attacks, if you control no untapped lands, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: They fight beyond thought, beyond fear, and beyond mercy.

mc.name: Zerapa Minotaur
mc.oracleText:
First strike
{2}: Zerapa Minotaur loses first strike until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText:
First strike
{2}: Zerapa Minotaur loses first strike until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
mc.flavorText: There's no difference between bone and crystal when it's piercing your throat.

mc.name: Devastate
mc.oracleText: Destroy target land. Devastate deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: Destroy target land. Devastate deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.flavorText:
"You're willing to die for your homeland. I'm willing to kill for it."
--Latulla, Keldon overseer

mc.name: Latulla's Orders
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to defending player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.
mc.printedText:
You may play Latulla's Orders any time you could play an instant.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to defending player, you may have it destroy target artifact that player controls.

mc.name: Rhystic Lightning
mc.oracleText: Rhystic Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature or player unless that creature's controller or that player pays {2}. If he or she does, Rhystic Lightning deals 2 damage to the creature or player.
mc.printedText: Rhystic Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature or player unless that creature's controller or that player pays {2}. If he or she does, Rhystic Lightning deals 2 damage to the creature or player.

mc.name: Barbed Field
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
mc.printedText: Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
mc.flavorText: Wherever they went, the Keldons transformed the land into a weapon.

mc.name: Brutal Suppression
mc.oracleText: Activated abilities of Rebels cost an additional "Sacrifice a land" to play.
mc.printedText: Activated abilities on Rebel cards cost an additional "Sacrifice a land" to play.
mc.flavorText:
"They no longer care about their own suffering. Show them something worse."
--Latulla, Keldon overseer

mc.name: Scoria Cat
mc.oracleText: Scoria Cat gets +3/+3 as long as you control no untapped lands.
mc.printedText: Scoria Cat gets +3/+3 as long as you control no untapped lands.
mc.flavorText: Like a volcano, it too can erupt without warning.

mc.name: Keldon Arsonist
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice two lands: Destroy target land.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice two lands: Destroy target land.
mc.flavorText:
"Fields can be replanted. Settlements can be rebuilt. Burn it all."
--Latulla, Keldon overseer

mc.name: Branded Brawlers
mc.oracleText:
Branded Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land.
Branded Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.
mc.printedText:
Branded Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land.
Branded Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.
mc.flavorText:
"The sword or the lash. Choose."
--Akul, Keldon whip sergeant

mc.name: Panic Attack
mc.oracleText: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.
mc.printedText: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.
mc.flavorText: Sometimes everyone decides to go for help at the same time.

mc.name: Inflame
mc.oracleText: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.
mc.printedText: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.
mc.flavorText: Wound, maim, kill: it's all the same to a Keldon.

mc.name: Search for Survivors
mc.oracleText: Remove your graveyard from the game. An opponent chooses a card at random from among those cards. If it's a creature card, put it into play. Otherwise, it remains removed from the game. Then return the rest of those cards to your graveyard and shuffle them.
mc.printedText: Shuffle your graveyard. An opponent chooses a card from it at random. If that card is a creature card, put it into play. Otherwise, remove it from the game.
mc.flavorText: There's no rest for a Keldon.

mc.name: Flameshot
mc.oracleText:
You may discard a Mountain card rather than pay Flameshot's mana cost.
Flameshot deals 3 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.
mc.printedText:
You may discard a mountain from your hand instead of paying Flameshot's mana cost.
Flameshot deals 3 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

mc.name: Citadel of Pain
mc.oracleText: At the end of each player's turn, Citadel of Pain deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands he or she controls.
mc.printedText: At the end of each player's turn, Citadel of Pain deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands he or she controls.
mc.flavorText:
"Battle is our religion. This fortress is our temple."
--Latulla, Keldon overseer

mc.name: Avatar of Fury
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent controls seven or more lands, Avatar of Fury costs {6} less to play.
Flying
{R}: Avatar of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
If an opponent controls seven or more lands, Avatar of Fury costs {6} less to play.
{R}: Avatar of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Veteran Brawlers
mc.oracleText:
Veteran Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land.
Veteran Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.
mc.printedText:
Veteran Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land.
Veteran Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.
mc.flavorText: Death awaits them on both fronts.

mc.name: Latulla, Keldon Overseer
mc.oracleText: {X}{R}, {T}, Discard two cards: Latulla, Keldon Overseer deals X damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {X}{R}, {T}, Discard two cards from your hand: Latulla, Keldon Overseer deals X damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"Everything around her suffers."
--Haddad, Kipamu soldier

mc.name: Lesser Gargadon
mc.oracleText: Whenever Lesser Gargadon attacks or blocks, sacrifice a land.
mc.printedText: Whenever Lesser Gargadon attacks or blocks, sacrifice a land.
mc.flavorText:
Trod on by a gargadon
--Kipamu expression meaning
"wiped out"

mc.name: Keldon Firebombers
mc.oracleText: When Keldon Firebombers comes into play, each player sacrifices all lands he or she controls except for three.
mc.printedText: When Keldon Firebombers comes into play, each player sacrifices all lands he or she controls except for three.
mc.flavorText:
"If there isn't enough of Jamuraa left to stand on, I will still claim it for Keld."
--Latulla, Keldon overseer

mc.name: Fickle Efreet
mc.oracleText: Whenever Fickle Efreet attacks or blocks, flip a coin at end of combat. If you lose the flip, an opponent gains control of Fickle Efreet.
mc.printedText: Whenever Fickle Efreet attacks or blocks, flip a coin at end of combat. If you lose the flip, an opponent gains control of Fickle Efreet.
mc.flavorText: Flame chooses its own course.

mc.name: Searing Wind
mc.oracleText: Searing Wind deals 10 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Searing Wind deals 10 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"The first wind of ascension is Forger, burning away impurity."
--Keld Triumphant

mc.name: Task Mage Assembly
mc.oracleText:
When there are no creatures in play, sacrifice Task Mage Assembly.

{2}: Task Mage Assembly deals 1 damage to target creature. Any player may play this ability but only any time he or she could play a sorcery.
mc.printedText:
When there are no creatures in play, sacrifice Task Mage Assembly.
{2}: Task Mage Assembly deals 1 damage to target creature. Any player may play this ability but only any time he or she could play a sorcery.

mc.name: Vintara Elephant
mc.oracleText:
Trample
{3}: Vintara Elephant loses trample until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText:
Trample
{3}: Vintara Elephant loses trample until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
mc.flavorText: Trained with the aid of rhystic magic, they become uneasy in its absence.

mc.name: Rib Cage Spider
mc.oracleText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Rib Cage Spider may block as though it had flying.
mc.flavorText: Everything it sees it considers food--and with that many eyes, it's not liable to miss much.

mc.name: Spore Frog
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Spore Frog: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Spore Frog: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
mc.flavorText: The end of one life is merely the beginning of thousands more.

mc.name: Silt Crawler
mc.oracleText: When Silt Crawler comes into play, tap all lands you control.
mc.printedText: When Silt Crawler comes into play, tap all lands you control.
mc.flavorText: If they could replenish the land instead of draining it, Jamuraa would be teeming with them.

mc.name: Vintara Snapper
mc.oracleText: Vintara Snapper has shroud as long as you control no untapped lands. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Vintara Snapper can't be the target of spells or abilities as long as you control no untapped lands.
mc.flavorText:
"The snapper is still when all else moves
And strikes when all are dozing."
--Tales of the Vintara Forest

mc.name: Darba
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Darba unless you pay {G}{G}.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Darba unless you pay {G}{G}.
mc.flavorText: Legend has it the darba gave up its wings in return for an extra stomach.

mc.name: Thresher Beast
mc.oracleText: Whenever Thresher Beast becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a land.
mc.printedText: Whenever Thresher Beast becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a land.
mc.flavorText: It destroys everything in its path, including the path itself.

mc.name: Calming Verse
mc.oracleText: Destroy all enchantments you don't control. Then, if you control an untapped land, destroy all enchantments you control.
mc.printedText: Destroy all enchantments you don't control. Then, if you control an untapped land, destroy all enchantments you control.
mc.flavorText: The chattering forest fell silent as the otherworldly song began.

mc.name: Jolrael's Favor
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Enchant creature
{1}{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
mc.printedText:
You may play Jolrael's Favor any time you could play an instant.
{1}{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
mc.flavorText:
"War destroys; nature renews."
--Jolrael, empress of beasts

mc.name: Wild Might
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. That creature gets an additional +4/+4 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. That creature gets an additional +4/+4 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
mc.flavorText: The hunted can become the fiercest hunters.

mc.name: Verdant Field
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
mc.printedText: Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
mc.flavorText: Jolrael tends the land so that the land will tend the beasts.

mc.name: Pygmy Razorback
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText: As a rite of passage, Kipamu youths taunt razorbacks with long sticks . . . then flee.

mc.name: Marsh Boa
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk
mc.printedText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a swamp.)
mc.flavorText: Though a powerful constrictor, it prefers simply to drown its prey.

mc.name: Root Cage
mc.oracleText: Mercenaries don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
mc.printedText: Mercenaries don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
mc.flavorText: The Vintara Forest welcomes its enemies with a crushing embrace.

mc.name: Spitting Spider
mc.oracleText:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Sacrifice a land: Spitting Spider deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
mc.printedText:
Spitting Spider may block as though it had flying.
Sacrifice a land: Spitting Spider deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

mc.name: Living Terrain
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.
mc.printedText: Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.
mc.flavorText: Keldons were accustomed to rugged terrain, but they never expected it to be aggressive.

mc.name: Snag
mc.oracleText:
You may discard a Forest card rather than pay Snag's mana cost.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by unblocked creatures this turn.
mc.printedText:
You may discard a forest from your hand instead of paying Snag's mana cost.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by unblocked creatures this turn.

mc.name: Thrive
mc.oracleText: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.
mc.printedText: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.
mc.flavorText: "We wait and watch, and as we prepare for war, we grow strong."

mc.name: Avatar of Might
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent controls at least four more creatures than you, Avatar of Might costs {6} less to play.
Trample (If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
mc.printedText:
Trample
If an opponent controls at least four more creatures than you, Avatar of Might costs {6} less to play.

mc.name: Squirrel Wrangler
mc.oracleText:
{1}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Put two 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens into play.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Squirrel creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{1}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Put two 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens into play.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice a land: All Squirrels get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Gnawed to death. Bad way to go."

mc.name: Jolrael, Empress of Beasts
mc.oracleText: {2}{G}, {T}, Discard two cards: Until end of turn, all lands target player controls are 3/3 creatures that are still lands.
mc.printedText: {2}{G}, {T}, Discard two cards from your hand: Until end of turn, all lands target player controls are 3/3 creatures that are still lands.
mc.flavorText: "I need no army. I have Jamuraa."

mc.name: Mungha Wurm
mc.oracleText: You can't untap more than one land during your untap step.
mc.printedText: You can't untap more than one land during your untap step.
mc.flavorText: Cities have crumbled under its weight.

mc.name: Forgotten Harvest
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a land card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a land card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

mc.name: Vitalizing Wind
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +7/+7 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +7/+7 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The fifth wind of ascension is Exalter, fulfilling Keld's destiny."
--Keld Triumphant

mc.name: Dual Nature
mc.oracleText:
Whenever a nontoken creature comes into play, its controller puts a token into play as a copy of that creature.
Whenever a nontoken creature leaves play, remove all tokens with the same name as that creature from the game.
When Dual Nature leaves play, remove all tokens created with it from the game.
mc.printedText:
Whenever a creature card comes into play, its controller puts a creature token into play that's a copy of that creature.
Whenever a creature card leaves play, remove all tokens with the same name as that creature from the game.
When Dual Nature leaves play, remove all tokens created with it from the game.

mc.name: Hollow Warrior
mc.oracleText: Hollow Warrior can't attack or block unless you tap an untapped creature you control not declared as an attacking or blocking creature this turn.
mc.printedText: Hollow Warrior can't attack or block unless you tap an untapped creature you control. (This cost is paid as attackers or blockers are declared.)
mc.flavorText: Though it moves like a living thing, anyone can tell it lacks a soul--not to mention mercy.

mc.name: Chimeric Idol
mc.oracleText: {0}: Tap all lands you control. Chimeric Idol becomes a 3/3 Turtle artifact creature until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {0}: Tap all lands you control. Chimeric Idol becomes a 3/3 artifact creature until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: After a chimeric idol attacked them, the Keldons smashed all unfamiliar statues.

mc.name: Well of Life
mc.oracleText: At the end of your turn, if you control no untapped lands, you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: At the end of your turn, if you control no untapped lands, you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText:
When you have given everything, then you have everything to gain.
--Well inscription

mc.name: Copper-Leaf Angel
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice X lands: Put X +1/+1 counters on Copper-Leaf Angel.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice X lands: Put X +1/+1 counters on Copper-Leaf Angel.
mc.flavorText:
"When Serra made angels, people called her a goddess. My angels are far superior to hers."
--Latulla, Keldon overseer

mc.name: Keldon Battlewagon
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Keldon Battlewagon can't block.
When Keldon Battlewagon attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
Tap an untapped creature you control: Keldon Battlewagon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the tapped creature's power.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Keldon Battlewagon can't block.
When Keldon Battlewagon attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
Tap an untapped creature you control: Keldon Battlewagon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the tapped creature's power.

mc.name: Well of Discovery
mc.oracleText: At the end of your turn, if you control no untapped lands, draw a card.
mc.printedText: At the end of your turn, if you control no untapped lands, draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
When you have given everything, then you are capable of anything.
--Well inscription

mc.name: Rhystic Cave
mc.oracleText: {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool unless any player pays {1}. You can't play this ability as another spell or ability is being played.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool unless any player pays {1}.
mc.flavorText:
"All mages dip into the same well; some are just in more of a hurry."
--Alexi, zephyr mage

mc.name: Noxious Field
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to each creature and each player."
mc.printedText: Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to each creature and each player."
mc.flavorText: Ultimately, it became a three-way battle: the land attacked both armies.

mc.name: Chilling Apparition
mc.oracleText:
{B}: Regenerate Chilling Apparition.
Whenever Chilling Apparition deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
{B}: Regenerate Chilling Apparition.
Whenever Chilling Apparition deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card from his or her hand.
mc.flavorText: Mortal minds shrivel at its touch.

mc.name: Wing Storm
mc.oracleText: Wing Storm deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of creatures with flying that player controls.
mc.printedText: Wing Storm deals X damage to each player, where X is twice the number of creatures with flying that player controls.
mc.flavorText: A thousand wings beating as one can choke the sky itself.
